price: Na hapo tunge wapa malipo makubwa kutoka kwetu.
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
footnotes: Na lau kuwa wamesimama juu ya Haki aliyo ilazimisha Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kadri ya uweza wao, Mwenyezi Mungu angeli wapa malipo makubwa kwa fadhila yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
